thread.title: "You made a reputation by showing your knockers!" CBB's Kim Woodburn takes a swipe at Nicola McLean's Page 3 career
thread.title_full: "You made a reputation by showing your knockers!" CBB's Kim Woodburn takes a swipe at Nicola McLean's Page 3 career

author: Lara Martin
title: "You made a reputation by showing your knockers!" CBB's Kim Woodburn takes a swipe at Nicola McLean's Page 3 career
text:
"You made a reputation by showing your knockers!" CBB's Kim Woodburn takes a swipe at Nicola McLean's Page 3 career The insults have been flying overnight in the CBB house as Kim and Nicola continue to fight Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Kim and Nicola have ANOTHER blazing row in CBB Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Woodburn has taken a swipe at Nicola McLean ’s former glamour modelling career during another heated row in the Celebrity Big Brother house. 
It’s like Groundhog Day in the CBB compound tonight as it all kicks off YET AGAIN between Kim and Nicola. 
In scenes to air this evening, the pair are rowing yet again, after another game that’s meant to be fun goes very wrong. 
“Shut up big gob!” Kim screams at Nicola. 
Nicola replies: “You’re a nasty piece of work and you’re showing yourself to be awful.” Kim screams, "Shut up big gob" at Nicola (Photo: bbuk/Twitter) Nicola tells Kim she's behaving badly (Photo: bbuk/Twitter) The housemates had been taking part in a task (Photo: bbuk/Twitter) Read More When is the Celebrity Big Brother 2017 final? Date, time and all you need to know about the exciting finale 
Kim retorts: “And you’re a vile little creature who is jealous of everybody and anybody. Start and I’m warning you now.” 
She then adds: “You’re a Page 3 girl who made a reputation by showing your knockers, dear.” 
Nicola retaliates by saying: “You are a no good vile f**king scum of the earth. Shut your f**king mouth.” Kim takes a swipe at Nicola's Page 3 career (Photo: bbuk/Twitter) Nicola tells Kim she's unimpressed (Photo: bbuk/Twitter) 
Then Coleen Nolan finds herself involved, as Kim brands her two-faced. But Coleen replies: “You are vile. I totally agree.” 
There’s certainly no love lost between the two women and it doesn’t look likely that they’ll be calling a truce before Friday night’s live finale. 
How Clean Is Your House star Kim, 74, lost her cool with model Nicola, 35, last night as well, unleasheding a torrent of fury against her when the Celebrity Big Brother Awards went very wrong. 
Kim raged: “You really are a nasty piece of work and I don’t know why the hell you are. You want to pick on Kim? Don’t you bother. I had hoped we had a little something here but you’re a nasty b***h of a girl, you’re a saddo. Don’t start with me, you haven’t got the strength." Kim exploded at Nicola tonight (Photo: Channel 5) Nicola remained silent as Kim screamed at her (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
